name: Bonemerang Pumpkin Smasher
description:
Made for gotm.io's Jam #9 (https://gotm.io/jam/gotm-jam/9), Bonemerang Pumpkin Smasher is a simple arcade game where you throw bones to smash pumpkins! :D

Move your character with WASD (or the left joystick on a gamepad), move the bones when in the air with IJKL (or the right joystick on a gamepad), and shoot bones with the space bar (or any trigger button on a gamepad).
